name: PHVS_ImmunizationServiceFundingEligibility_HL7_2x
title: Immunization Service Funding Eligibility Value Set
description: Identifies the Immunization Service Funding Eligibility assigned to the patient for the purpose of identifying sources of reimbursement. See User Defined Table 0064 Financial Class in Appendix 1 in CDC Implementation Guide for Immunization Data Transactions.

concept.display: Medicaid (may be called by state-specific name, e.g., Medi-Cal)
S-CHIP coverage-combination of Medicaid and separate-not VFC eligible
S-CHIP coverage-separate from Medicaid-not VFC eligible
Some or all vaccine costs covered
Underinsured (no vaccine costs covered and not FQC/RHC)
VFC eligible – Federally Qualified Health Center Patient (under-insured)
VFC eligible - State-specific eligibility (e.g., S-CHIP plan)
